articles.content: Bharat Forge share price rose almost 2 per cent to hit its fresh 52-week high of 1,096 in intraday trade on BSE on Monday. The stock opened at 1,086 against the previous close of 1,078.15 and rose 1.… [+3522 chars]

articles.title: Tata Steel shares rally over 13% in 6 sessions. What's cooking? - The Economic Times
articles.description: Tata Steel shares witnessed a strong buying action in the opening trade with over 1.22 crore shares trading on the NSE in the early trade. It was also one of the top Nifty50 stocks.
